biotools.summary:
An integrated workflow to investigate the effect of SARS-CoV-2 on intracellular signalling and regulatory pathways.

ViralLink is a systems biology workflow which reconstructs and analyses networks representing the effect of viral infection on specific human cell types.

bioschemas.name: ViralLink
